XData.name: Domain
XData.Description:
An XML representation of the domain this class defines.

For a detailed reference of the available elements and attributes, consult the class reference for %iKnow.Model.domain and other classes in the %iKnow.Model package.
XData.Data: <domain name="COVID-19 Body Text"> <metadata> <field name="PaperID"/> <field name="Source" storage="1" /> <field name="Title" /> </metadata> <data> <query sql="SELECT %ID as ID, * FROM Research.FullDocument" idField="ID" groupField="Source" dataFields="BodyText" metadataFields="PaperID,Source,Title" metadataColumns="PaperID,Source,Title" > </query> </data> </domain>
